name: Let's Split Up (A Visual Novel)
description:
You play as Iris, who is on her to way to a hot vacation with her best friend and both their boyfriends. They drive up a mountain only to have their car break down in a small strange town. The gang decide to split up and you choose which friend you want to go with and where you want to go on Luna Mountain - a place that can be either charming, fun or creepy as hell.



* Choose which of Iris’ friends you want to go with and how you’ll spend your night on Luna Mountain
* Choose how Iris responds to questions changing the dialogue on repeat play-throughs
* All 24 endings are available from the beginning – it’s all up to you
* Keep track of everything using the official guide



* Game comes with a free printable guide
* All characters are hand drawn and colored to give the game a unique storybook appearance
* All 13 different backgrounds are hand-drawn and water-colored
* In addition to the four main characters, you’ll come across six more side characters
Experience good, bad, scary and downright weird endings
